root.name: Panic in the Park
root.description: OverviewPanic in the Park is a interactive adventure game in which you navigate through 3D environments and interact with characters represented by real actors and play arcade games and solve puzzles.StoryA set of beautiful twins, one sweet and one diabolical, are fighting over the ownership of the ageing Skyview amusment park after the previous owner, there father, has died. There is more going on behind the parks gates than meets the eye. As a reporter its up to you to find out the through and help the sweet twin Jamie.
